encyclopedia.title: Rob bruin Himalajan kat
encyclopedia.fact: Known for its rounded brown coat.

encyclopedia.title: Turkse Van kat
encyclopedia.fact: Loves swimming and has a white body.

encyclopedia.title: Rooi Persiese kat
encyclopedia.fact: A Persian breed with red fur.

encyclopedia.title: Maine Coon
encyclopedia.fact: Large breed known for its tufted ears.

encyclopedia.title: Ragdoll kat
encyclopedia.fact: Called ragdoll for its relaxed pose.
